ingredients.ingredient: ½ (8 ounce) package cream cheese, softened
1 (14 ounce) package Hillshire Farm® Smoked Sausage
2 fresh jalapeno peppers, halved lengthwise and seeded

cookingTips: Slice sausage into thin rounds or strips to fit inside jalapeno halves
Layer cream cheese and sausage in each jalapeno half before wrapping with bacon
Bake at 400°F for 15-20 minutes until bacon is crispy and sausage is heated through
enrichment.coachingPrompt: How would you balance the sausage flavor with the cream cheese to avoid overwhelming the jalapeno heat?
